中国首次南极考察队出发
美国职业棒球大联盟世界大赛

en.title: Anwar Sadat and Menachem Begin jointly awarded Nobel Peace Prize.
Antigua and Barbuda gained independence from the United Kingdom.
The Big Bang theory gets further support from cosmic microwave background research.
US government indicted Manuel Noriega on drug trafficking charges.
Golfer Payne Stewart dies in plane crash.
Cristina Fernández de Kirchner elected President of Argentina.
Pittsburgh synagogue shooting results in 11 deaths.
Rishi Sunak became the Prime Minister of the United Kingdom.
